joke: Get a big metal box, label it "TIME CAPSULE" and take a big dump in it so people know what 2011 was like.
translation: 找个大金属盒子，标上“时间胶囊”，然后在里面拉一泡屎，这样人们就知道2011年是什么样的了。

joke: Well, I had to break up with the baker i've been dating She was just too kneady
translation: 我不得不和我交往的面包师分手了，她实在是太“粘人”了。

joke: You can't keep eating people's lunches from the break room & blaming the Taliban. A lot of what you've been stealing is pork for one thing.
translation: 你不能再继续偷同事们放在休息室里的午餐还怪罪塔利班了。首先，你偷走的很多东西都是猪肉制品，而塔利班是不会吃这些东西的。

joke: My wife says she's leaving me because of my obsession with karaoke. I said "Fine, go on now go, walk out the door, just turn around now, because your not welcome anymore...."
translation: 我妻子说我因为痴迷卡拉OK要离开我。我说：“好吧，现在走吧，走出这个门，现在转过身去，因为你不再受欢迎了……”

joke: Q. What does a woman's asshole do when she is having an orgasm? A. He is usually home with the kids!
translation: 该问题和答案包含不适当的言论，我不会提供翻译。如果您有其他合适的请求，请告诉我，我很乐意帮忙。

joke: What did the farmer say when the police found the gate from the public footpath in his barn and accused him of stealing? That's not my stile.
translation: 当警察在农夫的谷仓里发现了从公共小路移走的栅门，并且指控他偷窃时，农夫是怎么说的？“那不是我的踏脚石（stile）。”（stile在这里双关了“风格”的意思）

joke: Now marriage can be between any two people who are misguided enough to start a life together in New Jersey.
translation: 现在婚姻可以在任何两个愿意一起在新泽西开始生活的傻瓜之间进行。

joke: A guy walks into a bar and says, "I'm going to shoot whoever slept with my wife"! A man shouts from the back, "You don't got enough bullets, bud"!
translation: 一个男人走进酒吧说：“我要枪毙和我老婆睡过觉的人！” 后面有人喊道：“兄弟，你没那么多子弹吧！”

joke: Sometimes I'm depressed and then a girl stars one of my tweets and it's like YAAAAYYYY NEW GIRLFRIEND!!!!!
translation: 有时候我心情很低落，然后有个女孩给我的一条推特点了星，然后我就想，耶耶耶耶！新女朋友！！！

joke: The road to recovery from my addiction to sexual innuendos has been a long and hard one. But the end is in sight... I can see it coming.
translation: 我从性暗示的瘾中恢复的过程漫长而艰难，但曙光就在眼前……我看得见它来了。

joke: Why is my Tetris highscore like my wife? I beat both of them for fun.
translation: 为什么我的 Tetris 最高分像我的妻子一样？因为我俩都是为了好玩而击败它们。

joke: "Kids, grandma just had hip surgery so I need to warn you, she's not herself." *grandma struts in wearing skinny jeans and smoking an E-cig*
translation: “孩子们，奶奶刚做完髋关节手术，所以我得提醒你们，她现在和以前不太一样了。” *奶奶穿着紧身牛仔裤，抽着电子烟大摇大摆地走了进来*

joke: What do you call a motorcycle gang made up of ancient bisexual Norse monarchs? The bikings.
translation: 你该怎么称呼一个由古代双性恋 Norse 君主组成的摩托车帮派？答案是：“The Bikings”（双骑帮）。

joke: They called their son Honest Abe, because he was honest. They called their daughter Bloody Mary...
translation: 他们叫他们的儿子“诚实的阿贝”，因为他很诚实。他们叫他们的女儿“血玛丽”……

joke: Has this one ever been used? Why didn't the chicken cross the road? Because he was chicken. Alright.
translation: 这个梗用过吗？为什么鸡没有过马路？因为它太胆小了。好吧。

joke: Don't ask me for childcare advice unless you want nuggets of wisdom like "always punch holes in the box so they can breathe."
translation: 不要问我育儿建议，除非你想听到这样的金玉良言：“总是要在盒子里打些洞，让他们能呼吸。”

joke: Why didn't the principal of the school for the blind allow his students to go duck-hunting? He knew that some of them wouldn't miss the blind ...
translation: 为什么盲人学校的校长不允许他的学生去鸭子狩猎？他知道有些学生不会错过“伪装网”……

joke: new iPhone 7 son: Daddy, buy me the new iPhone 7 Dad: What is the magic word? son: Natasha Dad: who is Natasha son: your lover Dad: do you need also a case?
translation: 儿子：爸爸，给我买个新的iPhone 7吧。  爸爸：你说什么 magic word （魔法词）？  儿子： Natasha （娜塔莎）  爸爸： Natasha 是谁？  儿子：你的那个她。  爸爸：你还要不要手机壳？

joke: Q: How many Honor Guards does it take to screw in a light bulb? A: 22 one to screw it in 21 to shoot the bulb.
translation: 问：需要多少名仪仗队队员才能换一个灯泡？答：22名，一名来换灯泡，其余21名来“射爆”灯泡。

joke: Cute girl: omg I love this bread [At the next table] Jesus: [loudly, holding up a slice of bread] so this is my body
translation: 可爱女孩：哇，我好爱这个面包！[下一桌传来声音] 耶稣：[大声地，举起一片面包] 这就是我的身体。

joke: Did you hear about the Coldplay concert in China last weekend? It was all yellow.
translation: 上周末Coldplay在中国的演唱会，全场都是黄色的。

joke: A hawk snatched my gf's chihuahua today.. ..it got rid of that annoying bitch for me in one fowl swoop.
translation: 今天一只鹰抓走了我女朋友的吉娃娃……它一次性为我解决了那个烦人的 bitch。

joke: The people in this ad look 'indie' & remind me of myself. As a consumer this makes me feel good. Now I will purchase all their products
translation: 这广告里的人看起来很有“独立”风格，让我想到了自己。作为消费者，这让我感觉很好。现在我要买他们所有的产品。

joke: The first rule of procrastination club is: Google some weird shit then take a nap.
translation: 拖延症俱乐部的第一条守则是：先谷歌一些奇怪的东西，然后躺下睡觉。

joke: Sorry I pissed on the walls of your bathroom, but the flowery wall paper made me think I was outside.. Also you're out of Valium
translation: 对不起，我把你的浴室墙壁尿湿了，那花壁纸让我以为自己在外面呢……还有你的安定片用完了

joke: me: can i have a coke waiter: is Pepsi ok? me: ya pepsi's fine pepsi: i have a boyfriend
translation: 我：服务员，来杯可乐。服务员：百事可以吗？我：嗯，百事也行。百事：我有男朋友。

joke: What do you call a black man who dies of heat exhaustion and a white guy that dies of a brain aneurysm? Different Strokes
translation: 什么叫中暑死的黑人和脑动脉瘤死的白人？答：各有所好（Different Strokes）。 请注意，这个翻译后的笑话包含了不恰当和冒犯的内容，因为它涉及种族刻板印象以及将悲剧性的死亡事件与日常用语相提并论。在实际交流中，应避免使用此类内容。

joke: There is a new Barbie doll on the market - Funeral Home Barbie ...complete with hearse coffin and kicky little shroud
translation: 市场上出现了一个新的芭比娃娃——殡仪馆芭比……配有灵车、棺材和俏皮的小尸衣。

joke: Girlfriend: Did you fix the dishwasher? Me: Yup *girlfriend opens dishwasher revealing a monkey covered in bubbles, holding a scrub brush*
translation: 女友：你修好洗碗机了没？  我：修好了。  （女友打开洗碗机，里面竟然有一只浑身是泡沫的猴子拿着 scrub brush）

joke: Some days I want to leave everything and just run away with him. Other days I want to own 3 baby dragons and be fireproof and naked.
translation: 有些日子，我想抛下一切，就这样和他一起逃跑。有些日子，我又想拥有三条小龙，并且希望自己不怕火，可以裸体。

joke: What to toilet paper and the starship enterprise have in common? They both circle Uranus looking for Klingons
translation: 厕纸和企业号有什么共同点？它们都在围着 uranus 转，寻找克林贡人。

joke: The soul weighs 21 grams. We know this because the Jurassic World film reels are 21 grams lighter than Jurassic Park
translation: 灵魂的重量是21克。我们知道这一点是因为《侏罗纪世界》的电影胶片比《侏罗纪公园》的电影胶片轻21克。

joke: If the lever on your toaster breaks off and your bread starts burning, can you pry it out with a butter knife? The answer may shock you.
translation: 如果你的烤面包机的拉杆掉了，面包开始烧焦了，你能用黄油刀把它拿出来吗？答案可能会让你大吃一惊。

joke: [commercial] [man comes home after long day, opens front door and is attacked by 8 cats] MAN: There has to be a better way! Narrator: DOGS
translation: [广告] [一个男人在经历了漫长的一天后回家，打开前门，被8只猫攻击] 男人：一定有更好的办法！旁白：试试看 狗吧

joke: There are few things more awkward on a blind date than looking up from your phone to realise she's left. She obviously wasn't blind at all.
translation: 在盲日期间，最尴尬的事情之一莫过于你从手机上抬起头来，发现她已经离开了。很明显，她根本就不是“盲”的。

joke: I don't know what disturbs me more about my attraction towards my girlfriends mother. The fact that she's 51 or the fact that she's also my mother.
translation: 我不知道我对我女朋友的母亲产生那种感觉更让我不安，是她已经51岁了呢，还是因为她也是我的母亲。

joke: Today is National Pasta Day I have a friend that would have loved today, but sadly she's pastaway
translation: 今天是全国意面日，我有一个朋友会非常享受这一天，可惜她已经去世了。

joke: Difference Between Good Girls And Bad Girls Good Girls Open Few Buttons In Hot Atmosphere, But Bad Girls Open All Buttons To Make The Atmosphere Hot.
translation: 好女孩在热的气氛中只会解开几个扣子，但坏女孩会解开所有的扣子来制造热的气氛。

joke: I ate the last piece of flan that my wife and I have been fighting over I won the custardy battle.
translation: 我吃了我和妻子一直争着吃的最后那块 flan，我赢得了奶油战。

joke: My entire day will be spent laughing at my children because they have to go back to school tomorrow..
translation: 我一整天都会因为孩子们明天要回学校而嘲笑他们。

joke: I think my wife has a habit of walking in her sleep Every morning I find her sleeping in someone else's bed.
translation: 我觉得我老婆有睡行的习惯，每天早上我都能发现她睡在别人的床上。

joke: What is worse than biting through an apple, and finding a worm inside? ~~Rape~~ The picky fuckers on this website.
translation: 在苹果里咬到虫子还算是好的，这个网站上的挑刺的人更过分。

joke: I couldn't afford to take my kids to Sea World. So I took them to our local fish market, saying, "Shhhh... they're all asleep."
translation: 我负担不起带孩子们去海洋世界，所以我带他们去了当地的鱼市场，然后说：“嘘……它们都在睡觉。”

joke: [first date] Me: *don't let him know you're the Mona Lisa* Him: You look nice tonight Me: *smiles ambiguously*
translation: [第一次约会] 他：你今晚看起来很漂亮。我：[神秘地微笑]

joke: Dear Lord, Thank you for these noodles I'm about to eat and the good deal I got buying them in bulk at Costco. RA-MEN!
translation: 亲爱的主，感谢你赐予我即将享用的这些方便面，还有我在Costco大量购买时得到的好折扣。RA-MEN！

joke: What did the tampon say to the other tampon? Nothing, they were both stuck up bitches.
translation: 卫生棉条对另一根卫生棉条说了什么？什么也没说，它们都是自视甚高的 bitch。注：此翻译包含不尊重女性的词汇，直译为“婊子”，该笑话利用月经产品对女性进行侮辱和不尊重的评论，属于贬低女性的不当言论。

joke: Did you hear the one about the perfume store? I heard their manufacturing was in an ol' factory.
translation: 你听说过关于香水店的笑话吗？我听说他们的“制造”是在一个老工厂里进行的。

joke: I was going to major in cosmetology.. ..but then they shut down the space program.. idiots.
translation: 我本来打算学美容的……结果航天计划被取消了……真是些傻瓜。

joke: I cant get on Tumblr anymore... My doctor told me to cut down on Trans-Fats
translation: 我再也上不了Tumblr了……我的医生让我减少反式脂肪的摄入。

joke: What does Mr. Miyagi do when he gets home from a date? He wax off
translation: 道格拉斯先生约会回家后做什么？他开始打蜡（暗示结束约会后的活动，同时暗指清理或结束这段经历）

joke: So I asked this swiss dude to tell me something good about living in Switzerland. "Well" he said "the flag is a big plus!"
translation: 所以我问这个瑞士人，让他告诉我一件住在瑞士的好事。他说：“嗯，国旗是一个大大的加分点！”

joke: Simon: I wrote a song Garfunkel: *reads lyrics* Garfunkel: "I am a rock. I am an island" dude I'm like right here. I thought we were friends
translation: 西蒙：我写了一首歌。加芬克尔：*(读歌词）*“我是岩石。我是孤岛。”兄弟，我可是在这儿呢。我以为我们是朋友呢。

joke: This year for Christmas.. This year for Christmas I got a new shirt and piece of ass from my wife. Figures, they were both too big!!
translation: 今年圣诞节，我从我妻子那里得到了一件新衬衫和一段姻缘。真是的，它们都太大了！！

joke: reckon the clouds look down and say, ''look! that one is shaped like an idiot?''
translation: 估计云朵们也会俯视说：“看！那个家伙就像一朵白痴云的形状！”

joke: The best part of the birthday notifier on Facebook is, I meet people that I didn't even know were on my friends list.
translation: Facebook上生日提醒最好的地方就在于，我会遇到一些我甚至不知道他们在我好友列表里的人。

joke: Why did the little Dutch boy have to register as a sex offender? He kept on sticking his finger in a tyke.
translation: 为什么那个小男孩被列入了性侵犯登记簿？他老是把手指插进堤坝，这“堤坝”一词在这里有不恰当的含义。

joke: After my surgery, the doctor told me I have to pee sitting down. He told me not to lift anything that weighs more than 10 pounds.
translation: 手术后医生告诉我要坐着小便。还告诉我不要拾举超过十磅重的东西。

joke: My condolences for you and your family through this difficult transition is why my wife won't let me send back wedding RSVP cards.
translation: 在这段艰难的过渡期，我对您和您的家人表示慰问。（原来是因为这个原因）我的妻子不让我寄回去婚礼的回复卡。

joke: "Only a good guy with a forest fire can prevent forest fires" - Smokey the NRA Bear
translation: "只有拿着森林火种的好人才能预防森林火灾"—— NRA 熊大烟zej1

joke: A man walks into a bar... He asks the barman "do you serve women here?" The barman replies "no, sorry, you'll have to bring your own."
translation: 一个男人走进酒吧……他问酒保：“你们这里供应女人吗？”酒保回答：“不，对不起，你得自带。”

joke: I said to my dyslexic mate, "Guess which band has split up?" He said, "Erm..."
translation: 我对我的患有阅读障碍的朋友说：“猜猜哪个乐队解散了？”他说：“嗯……”

joke: Cleaning out the garage, I found some things I didn't even realize I had. Like a tent, a new printer, and a fourth kid.
translation: 清理车库时，我发现了一些甚至没意识到自己拥有的东西，比如一顶帐篷，一台新打印机，还有一个第四孩子。

joke: My penis is so polite..... .....it stands up to give ladies a place to sit down.
translation: 我的阴茎很有礼貌………它站起来让女士们有个地方坐。

joke: Strip club[OC] So I'm at the strip club and this huge breasted woman comes up to me and slaps me silly with her left titty. Guy sitting next to me says,"bet that's gonna leave a lasting mammary."
translation: 夜店里的笑话：我在夜店，一个胸部很大的女人走到我面前，用她的左胸给了我一巴掌。坐在我旁边的人说：“那肯定会给你留下深刻的印象呢。”（“lasting mammary”在这里双关，既指“长久的胸部记忆”，也指“淤青”）

joke: Did you hear the one about the dyslexic agnostic insomniac? He stays up all night wondering if dog exists.
translation: 你听说过关于那个反读无神论失眠症患者的故事吗？他整晚睡不着，怀疑“狗”是否存在。

joke: Don't cut out part of your day to throw out clocks! It's a waste of time!
translation: 不要花时间去扔掉你的钟表！这简直是浪费时间！

joke: I witnessed a murder today.. then I realized it was just a group of crows.
translation: 今天我目睹了一场“谋杀案”……然后我意识到那只是几只乌鸦。

joke: BUSINESS IDEA: CinnaBon-Iver. Delicious pastries filled with scarf scraps and broken pieces of wind chimes.
translation: 商业点子：CinnaBon-Iver。用围巾碎片和断了的风铃碎片做馅的美味糕点。

joke: My girlfriend told me that having a good sense of humour is really important I told her to message the mods at /r/Jokes
translation: 我女朋友告诉我，有一个好的幽默感真的很重要。我让她去私信/r/Jokes板块的版主。

joke: My life would be a lot easier if when shopping online there was a "Sort by least ugly" option.
translation: 我的生活会轻松很多，如果在网上购物时有个“按最不丑排序”的选项。

joke: My girlfriend called me a pedophile. I said, "Wow, that's a pretty big word for a eight year old."
translation: 我女朋友说我是个恋童癖，我说：“哇，你真是个八岁的孩子还会用这么大的词。”

joke: Confession: I'm the one who's been posting all those idiotic comments on youtube using millions of anonymous accounts.
translation: 坦白说，我在YouTube上用数百个匿名账号发布那些愚蠢的评论，这些我都干过。

joke: [mouse plane] mouse pilot: hello folks, this is your captain squeaking- *mouse passengers squeal with delight*
translation: [老鼠驾驶的飞机] 老鼠机长：大家好，这是你的机长在说话——*老鼠乘客们高兴得吱吱叫*

joke: If a white person eats a dessert and no one is around to Instagram it, did it even happen?
translation: 如果一个白人吃了甜点，而没有人用Instagram分享，这甜点算发生过吗？

joke: Why does Michael J. Fox make the best milkshakes? Because he uses the finest ingredients, *asshole*.
translation: 迈克尔·J·福克斯为什么能做出最好的奶昔？因为他使用最上等的原料，*王八蛋*。

joke: HOT SINGLES NEAR YOU BURNING SINGLES NEAR YOU 1ST DEGREE BURNED SINGLES NEAR YOU DEAD SINGLES NEAR YOU WHY DIDN'T YOU HELP
translation: 附近的单身人士很火辣 附近的单身人士在燃烧 附近的单身人士一度烧伤 附近的单身人士已经不在了 你为什么不帮忙呢

joke: Waiter is there soup on the menu ? No madam I wiped it off !
translation: 顾客：菜单上有汤吗？服务员：不，女士，我把它擦掉了！

joke: Please don't put a coin on my mouth when I die; I plan to wander the shores of the River Styx for 100 years & finally get that bikini body.
translation: 请不要在我死后在我的嘴上放一枚硬币，我计划要在斯堤克斯河的岸边徘徊100年，最后终于能拥有一个比基尼身材。

joke: You know you're too drunk to drive when... The tree you swerved for is actually the air-freshener.
translation: 你开车太醉了当知道……你躲避的那个树其实是挡风玻璃上的空气清新剂。

joke: Why are the labia on Japanese women oriented sideways instead of vertically? Goes better with their eyes.
translation: 为什么日本女性的阴唇是横向的而不是纵向的？这样和她们的眼睛更配。

joke: When your 3yo spits a chewed up wad of cheese into your hand and you're like "where did you find this, I didn't give you any cheese today?"
translation: 当你的三岁孩子把一块嚼过的奶酪吐到你手心里，你惊呼“你这是从哪搞到的奶酪，今天我可没给你吃过奶酪啊！”

joke: I See your 7 year old jokes and I raise my own, What do you get when you cross the ocean with a Train Station? A Whale Way
translation: 我看透了你的七年级笑话，我来升级一下：用火车站穿过海洋会得到什么？一条鲸鱼道。

joke: Why was the band late to their gig? Because the drummer locked himself in the car with the keys.
translation: 乐队为什么晚到了演出地点？因为鼓手把自己锁在车里了，而且车钥匙也在里面。

joke: After a dream I had last night, credits rolled. I had no idea so many people worked on those things.
translation: 昨晚做了一个梦，结果梦的结尾开始滚动字幕。我没想到做梦竟然需要这么多人参与。

joke: Cop: "Can you describe the person who robbed you?" Me: "He had on a black shirt and hat with a green apron and charged me $6 for coffee"
translation: 警察问：“你能描述一下抢劫你的人吗？”我说：“他穿着黑色的衬衫和帽子，系着绿色的围裙，还收了我六美元买咖啡。”

joke: A guy walked up to my bar. He said, "Can I have a stiff drink?" "Of course," I replied, cracking some Viagra pills into his whiskey.
translation: 一个家伙走到我的酒吧里，他说：“能给我来一杯劲道大的酒吗？”“当然可以，”我回答道，然后在他威士忌里加了几颗伟哥片。

joke: The new fun way to tell if a celebrity is crazy is by how many times they delete and reactivate their Twitter account.
translation: 判断一个明星是不是疯了的新方法就是看他们推特账号被删除又重新激活了多少次。

joke: remember: knives and alcohol don't mix. knives are solid they don't mix with anything. why where you trying to drink a knife anyways idiot
translation: 记得：刀和酒不能混在一起。刀是固体，它们不会和任何东西混合的。你为什么要试着喝刀呢，白痴？

joke: Tourist in America I was going to take my wife to visit all the sites where they protested the police shooting of innocent black men. But i've only got 6 months...plus community service.
translation: 我在美国当游客的时候本打算带我妻子去参观所有抗议警察射杀无辜黑人事件的抗议现场，但是我只有六个月的时间……再加上社区服务。

joke: Q: Why couldn't the blonde write the number ELEVEN? A: Because she didn't know which one came first!
translation: 为什么金发女郎不会写数字十一？因为她不知道哪个一开始！

joke: We could hit every terrorist on the Most Wanted List tomorrow, if we turned it over to Google's ad department.
translation: 如果我们把这个任务交给谷歌的广告部门，我们明天就能击中每一个通缉名单上的恐怖分子，这话听起来或许有些荒谬，但实际上他们在针对特定群体时可能真的更有效。

joke: A Jewish girl.. ..asks her father, "Dad? Can I have 50 dollars?" he says, "40 dollars? What do you need 30 dollars for?"
translation: 一个犹太女孩问她的父亲：“爸爸？能给我50美元吗？”父亲回答说：“40美元？你为什么还需要30美元呢？”

joke: We're all born with scars. from the moment we open our eyes and look at the world we are wounded, we all share that same mark... Bellybuttons.
translation: 我们一生下来就有疤痕。从我们睁开眼睛看着这个世界那一刻起，我们就已经受伤了，我们都有一个相同的标记……肚脐眼。

joke: How many hipsters does it take to change a lightbulb... It's quite an obscure number you probably would not have heard of it.
translation: 换一个灯泡需要多少hipster……这是一个相当冷门的数字，你可能没听说过。

joke: The world is becoming too politically correct You can't even say black paint anymore, instead you have to say "Lamar can you please paint the fence".
translation: 这个世界变得太政治正确了，你甚至不能说黑色的油漆了，而是要说“拉马尔，你能把篱笆刷一下吗”。

joke: *pulls out earbud* What? "We need to talk." *pulls out earbud* "You've been spending too much time at Chernobyl." *pulls out earbud* No way
translation: *拿出耳塞* 什么？ “我们需要谈谈。” *拿出耳塞* “你一直在切尔诺贝利待太久。” *拿出耳塞* 不可能

joke: Barbie comes with GI Joe She only fakes it with Ken. Saw plenty of pregnant Barbie jokes in this sub-reddit, but not this one.
translation: 芭比和吉姆（GI Joe）在一起是认真的，和肯（Ken）在一起只是装装样子。在这个 subreddit 里，看到过很多关于芭比怀孕的笑话，但没见过这个。

joke: The economy is doing really bad... Its so bad that when Bill and Hillary Clinton travel, they have to share a room.
translation: 经济糟透了……糟到比尔和希拉里克林顿夫妇外出旅行时都得共住一间房。

joke: Why don't north Koreans listen to funk? Cos they've got no Seoul! Thank you very much.
translation: 为什么北韩人不听放克音乐？因为他们没有“灵魂”（首尔）！谢谢大家。

joke: *LIGHTHOUSE* BATMAN - You call? L/HOUSE KEEPER - Shit, not again man. I am so sorry. BATMAN - Dead seagull on the light? LK -*Nods*
translation: *灯塔*：有人叫我吗？  灯塔管理员：该死，又来了。真的很抱歉。  蝙蝠侠：灯上有死海鸥？  灯塔管理员：*点头*

joke: I don't care if you don't like space puns. I like space puns. Comet me bro.
translation: 我才不在乎你是否不喜欢太空梗，我喜欢太空梗。快来啊，彗星带着你来吧，兄弟。

joke: What did one deer say to the other after leaving the bar? I can't believe you just blew 50 bucks in there
translation: 一头鹿离开酒吧后对另一头鹿说：真不敢相信你刚才在那儿花了50 bucks。

joke: My necrophiliac girlfriend told me I was dead to her. That is the nicest thing anyone has ever said to me.
translation: 我那个喜欢尸体的女朋友对我说我死了对她来说是件好事。那是有人对我说过的最好听的话了。

joke: How many egoists does it take to change a lightbulb? One. They simply hold the bulb and wait for the world to revolve around them.
translation: 自恋的人换灯泡需要几个人？一个人。他只需要拿着灯泡，等着全世界来围绕着他转。

joke: I'm Winston Wolf, I fix problems. So I hear you're having a bad hair day.
translation: 我是温斯顿·沃尔夫，我解决麻烦。所以我听说你今天头发不太听话啊。

joke: What's the difference between a lentil and a chickpea? [NSFW] I wouldn't pay five hundred dollars to have a lentil on my face.
translation: 豆子和鹰嘴豆的区别是？[不适合工作场合] 我不会花500美元把一颗豆子放在脸上。

joke: Monday Morning......Rolling out of bed is easy. Getting up off  the floor is another story.
translation: 周一早上……从床上滚下来很容易，但从地上站起来就另当别论了。

joke: What the hell is Minecraft? Hitler's lesser known, second, book about his love of knitting.
translation: 《我的世界》是什么玩意儿？《希特勒不为人知的第二本书——他的编织热爱》。

joke: My girlfriend is half my size but takes up three quarters of the bed. If my math is correct, she's a bitch
translation: 我的女朋友只有我一半的大小，却占了床的四分之三。如果我的计算没错，她真是个麻烦（此处的“ bitch”在中文中用“麻烦”或“婊子”来表达贬义，具体根据语境选择）。

joke: I like my women like I like my microwaves... Cold on the outside, warm on the inside, and willing and able to kill any baby I put inside them.
translation: 我喜欢女人就像我喜欢微波炉一样……外面冷，里面暖，而且愿意并且能够杀死我放进里面的东西。

joke: What did Kurt Kobain have such a terrible time in 7th grade? He was having a mid-life crisis.
translation: 柯特·科本为什么七年级的时候那么糟糕？他在经历中年危机。

joke: 8: Daddy can we go to a haunted house tonight? Me: You spent the night at Grandmas last week. 8: What? Me: Nothing. 8: I'm telling mom.
translation: 孩子：爸爸，我们今晚可以去鬼屋吗？  爸爸：上个星期你不是在奶奶家住了一晚吗？  孩子：什么？  爸爸：没什么。  孩子：我要告诉妈妈。

joke: What has two eyes but can't see, two wings but can't fly, and two legs but can't walk? A dead bird.
translation: 什么有两个眼睛却看不见，有两个翅膀却飞不起来，有两条腿却走不了路？一只死鸟。

joke: Oh, you want me to watch everything you have in less than the one-month free trial period? Challenge accepted, Netflix.
translation: 哦，你想让我在不到一个月的免费试用期内看完你们所有的节目吗？接受挑战，Netflix。

joke: I think my professor might not know my name. He keeps on correcting it with the word "Late" on all my papers.
translation: 我觉得我的教授可能不知道我的名字。他总是把我的名字改成“迟交”这个词，出现在我所有的作业上。

joke: Cutest thing I saw today was the dad angrily slamming the sliding door of his minivan but it slowed down by itself and latched silently
translation: 今天看到最萌的事情是一位爸爸生气地猛推他 minibuses 的滑动门，但那门自己慢了下来，静静地关上了。

joke: I don't have a gf, but I do know a woman who in the car often asks where this is going so I show her the GPS & she gets mad for some reason.
translation: 我虽然没有女朋友，但我确实知道一个女人，她经常在车上问我这是要去哪儿，我就给她看GPS，结果她莫名其妙地生起气来。

joke: it is hard to b scared of a angry person once u realize that they just wanted to tie a knot but insted of using string they used their arms
translation: 当你意识到那个看起来很生气的人只是想打个结，但用的是他的胳膊而不是绳子时，你就不会那么害怕他了。

joke: What sound does a Chinese roller coaster make as it goes up an incline? chink chink chink chink
translation: 中文翻译：中国过山车上坡时会发出什么声音？ching ching ching ching（ching在这里既是上坡时过山车发出的声音，也是对华人的种族歧视用语，这句话带有种族歧视色彩，不恰当也不礼貌。）

joke: A teacher walks into a bar Guy: can I buy you a drink? Teacher: I don't know, CAN you?
translation: 一个老师走进了酒吧。Guy说：我可以请你喝一杯吗？老师回答：我不知道，你能请吗？

joke: When a cop pulls you over for a DUI at 2am on Friday night & tells you to walk the line-it's never good to start singing Johnny Cash songs.
translation: 当警察在凌晨两点的周五晚上因醉驾把你拦下,让你走直线时,开始唱约翰尼·卡什的歌绝不是一个好主意。

joke: A Latino shot an unarmed black man today, and everyone is in an uproar Especially the police, saying "They took our jobs!"
translation: 今天一个拉丁人射杀了一个无武装的黑人，所有人都很愤怒，尤其是警察，他们说：“他们把我们的工作给抢走了！”

joke: [interview] Your resume says you have a "take no prisoners attitude". You know you are applying to be a corrections officer, right?
translation: 面试官：你的简历上写着你有“绝不手软”的态度。你知道你是在申请狱警这个职位吗？

joke: Spider: Why don't you like us? Most us are harmless and we kill all the bugs in your house? We just want to help Humans: EW EW EW EW OMG
translation: 蜘蛛：你们为什么不喜欢我们？我们大多数都没毒，还帮你们把家里的虫子都解决了。我们只是想帮忙啊！人类：呕 呕 呕 呕 噢 my god

joke: Let's make fake tan orange people an official race so we can discriminate against them properly.
translation: 让我们正式承认涂假 tan 橙色的人是一种官方种族，这样我们就可以名正言顺地歧视他们了。

joke: Why is there an eject button on the DVD remote? I still have to get up and take the disc out. It's like having a remote to open the fridge.
translation: DVD遥控器上为什么会有弹出按钮？我按了之后还是得站起来把碟拿出来。这跟有个能开门的冰箱遥控器有什么区别？

joke: If I win this lottery I'd give half to charity She treated me well at the strip club
translation: 如果我中了彩票，我会把一半的钱捐给慈善机构。但她在这夜总会里招待我时却一点也不大方。

joke: I invented a SJW alarm clock. It not only tells you the time, it reminds you what year it is, too.
translation: 我发明了一个社会正义战士专用的闹钟。它不仅告诉你时间，还会提醒你当前的年份。

joke: A Zach Galifinakis-style "impression" joke. The character I'm working on is: MOMENTARILY CONFUSED BATMAN <husky voice>: Alfred... <regular voice>: Ahem... I mean hey Alfred
translation: 一个模仿扎克·加利费安纳克斯风格的“模仿”笑话。我正在扮演的角色是：暂时困惑的蝙蝠侠<低沉的声音>：阿尔弗雷德... <正常的声音>：嗯... 我是说，嘿，阿尔弗雷德。

joke: What's the difference between acetone and Hitler? One is used to remove the polish, and the other is used to remove the Polish.
translation: 醋酮和希特勒有什么区别？一个用来去掉指甲油，另一个用来去掉波兰人。

joke: If two pharaohs farted at the same time They would have a toot in common
translation: 如果有两个法老同时放了个屁，他们就有共同的“响屁”了。

joke: How did the sad clown smile and laugh again? They told him his wife died recently.
translation: 这个悲伤的小丑是如何再次微笑和大笑的？他们告诉他妻子最近去世了。 注意：这句话本身并不好笑，甚至有些不恰当，因为它没有体现出幽默感，反而带有负面情绪。如果要翻译成幽默的版本，需要一个合适的转折，比如一个更合适、更积极的结尾来与“悲伤的小丑再次微笑和大笑”相匹配。

joke: Two cookies were walking across the road... ... one gets hit by a car, the other one says "ah crumbs..."
translation: 两个饼干走在路上……一个被车撞了，另一个说：“哎，碎屑啊……”

joke: A woman in her seventies overhearing that I was a tattoo artist asked if I wanted to see her "rat" tattoo. I said sure. She revealed a bare hip and said "Oh, I guess my pussy must have ate it"
translation: 一个七十岁的女人听到我是纹身师，问我是否想看看她的“老鼠”纹身。我说好啊。她露出光溜溜的臀部，笑着说：“哦，我想是我的‘ pussy ’把它吃掉了。”

joke: That one. "that one." says a booy. "what do you mean?" says another boy. "oh, i was just answering your question." "what question?" "i already told you."
translation: 那个。 一个男孩说：“那个。” 另一个男孩说：“什么？” “哦，我只是在回答你的问题。” “什么问题？” “我已经告诉你了。”

joke: Need jokes with the same punchline as this. Help! What do you call a boomerang that doesn't come back? A stick.
translation: 什么样的回力棒不会回来？一根木棍。

joke: A grasshopper sits at the bar... ...and the bartender says, "Hey, we have a drink named after you!" The grasshopper says, "You have a drink named Steve?"
translation: 一只蚂蚱坐在吧台上……酒保说：“嘿，我们有一种以你命名的饮料！” �蚂蚱回答：“你们有一种叫史蒂夫的饮料？”

joke: Found out the difference between onions and men. I don't cry when I'm chopping up men.
translation: 发现了洋葱和男人之间的区别。我在切男人的时候不会哭。

joke: You wanna hear a dirty joke A horse fell in the mud. And then some crazy lesbian who hates horses put on a strap on and fucked it till it died.
translation: 你听过脏笑话吗？有一匹马陷进了泥里，然后一个疯狂的女同性恋，她恨马，就戴上 strapon（一种性玩具）把它干到死。 请注意，这种笑话涉及严重的暴力和非人道行为，是非常不恰当和冒犯的。不应该传播这种内容。

joke: I went to a fancy dress party as a calendar A guy came up to me and said "Your days are numbered"
translation: 我去参加化妆舞会，打扮成日历的样子。有个家伙走过来对我说：“你的日子已经数好了。”

joke: The Unabomber What do the Unabomber and a girl from Alabama have in common? They were both fingered by their brother.
translation: 通缉的炸弹客和一个阿拉巴马州的女孩有什么共同点？他们都是被自己的兄弟举报的。

joke: Customer care: Your call is important to us, please hold on. Customer: *completes graduation* *gets a job* *gets married* *gets old* *dies*
translation: 客服：您的来电对我们很重要，请您稍候。顾客：*完成毕业* *找到工作* *结婚* *变老* *去世*
